titleStmt.title: A few, and new observations, vpon the booke of Genesis. The most of them certaine, the rest probable, all harmelesse, strange, and rarely heard off before. By Iohn Lightfoote Staffordiens.
titleStmt.author: Lightfoot, John, 1602-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Badger in the yeare,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
